definition: to put/to place/to release/to free/to let go/to let out/to set off (fireworks)

sentences.english: They reflect the very crude and quantitative mode of economic growth.
sentences.chinese: 他們反映了粗放型和數量型的經濟增長模式。

sentences.english: The United States economy, at one time, was based on heavy industries and raw production capacity.
sentences.chinese: 美國經濟在那時也主要基於重工業和粗放生產能力。

sentences.english: There was a foundation of wildness and bravery in her.
sentences.chinese: 她有一種粗放勇敢的氣質。

sentences.english: China's shift away from raw materials and manufactured goods is only natural.
sentences.chinese: 中國從粗放生產的遷移會自然發生。

sentences.english: The technology is very rudimentary, and the work is hard.
sentences.chinese: 採礦技術非常粗放，工作非常辛苦。

sentences.english: These companies were then plunged into corner. The main reason of misplay is that these companies'rough investing management .
sentences.chinese: 導致失誤的主要原因，是這些公司的投資管理粗放。

sentences.english: Second, the pattern of economic growth is inefficient.
sentences.chinese: 二是經濟增長方式粗放。

sentences.english: At present, the extensive management has become a problem in our conventional industries.
sentences.chinese: 當前，我國傳統產業存在着粗放型經營的問題。

sentences.english: The reason are related to the extensive feeding and badroughage quality.
sentences.chinese: 這與飼餵方式粗放，粗飼料品質差有關。

sentences.english: In other words, it is in the transitional period from extensiveness to intensiveness.
sentences.chinese: 或者說，是處於粗放型向集約型轉變的過渡時期。

sentences.english: To bring about a change from extensive to intensive management of the economy as a whole.
sentences.chinese: 促進整個經濟由粗放經營向集約經營轉變。

sentences.english: In Part III, the author analyzes why the extensive development exists in the Chinese milch cow industry.
sentences.chinese: 第三部分是中國奶牛業粗放式發展的原因分析。

sentences.english: The main reason of misplay is that these companies' rough investing management.
sentences.chinese: 導致失誤的主要原因，是這些公司的投資管理粗放。

sentences.english: But at present, the culture industry of our country is not only weak and small, but also crude and primitive.
sentences.chinese: 而目前我國文化產業偏弱偏小，程度粗放而原始。

sentences.english: Canada is rich in forest resources which are being managed extensively.
sentences.chinese: 加拿大森林資源豐富，經營粗放。

sentences.english: Extensive production and management, similar products at a low level repeated construction.
sentences.chinese: 生產經營管理粗放，同類產品在低水平上重複建設。

definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]
to stress in a prejudiced way/to emphasize sth unduly
